alphabetsoup.waypointgraph
Class BucketbotDriver

java.lang.Object
  alphabetsoup.framework.Circle
      alphabetsoup.base.BucketbotBase
          alphabetsoup.waypointgraph.BucketbotDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bucketbot, Updateable
public class BucketbotDriver
extends BucketbotBase

BucketbotDriver implements a functioning Bucketbot that can complete tasks, but only evades other buckets and bucketbots by trying to go directly around.

Author:
Chris Hazard

getBestEvadeDirection

public float getBestEvadeDirection(float visible_distance)
getBestEvadeDirection returns the largest approximate gap to escape. This gap is approximated by finding the gaps between all potential collideable objects around the Bucketbot, and weighting them positively by size and weighting them inversely by both distance and gapsize. The direction bisecting the largest of these weighted gaps is returned.

Parameters:
visible_distance - how far the Bucketbot can see
Returns:
best direction to evade

getNextWaypointTo

public Waypoint getNextWaypointTo(Waypoint start,
                                  Waypoint end)
Uses A* to find the next move the Bucketbot should make to get from start to end

Parameters:
start - Waypoint the Bucketbot is starting from
end - Waypoint the Bucketbot wants to get to
Returns:
Waypoint that is connected to start which is the best move to get towards end
